channel.title: Vertigo - Best Custom Maps Ever! - Comming soon
channel.description:
This server will be soon online and we are providing just some media to show more about the server. I will not write any more details but if you will ask more about some features or other information, i will answer. Its Soul-Split based server that is comming soon... I am adding more media.
Note: This most Advertising Media... but the server is still in development.
Developing team: Xion (Me) Head Client developer Mod Bradley (TheHolyGrail) Head Source developer
[IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/1504/45716984.png[/img] [IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/5450/96437789.png[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/3039/15105562.png[/img] [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/1372/capturesn.png[/img] [IMG]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/4111/89529188.png[/img] [IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4458/46065706.png[/img] [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/1339/45863232.png[/img] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4165/37861977.png[/img]
Spirit Attack: You can win extra great item by killing those tree spirits comming out from dreamen trees all arround of the home. They are agressive but you dont loose any stuff if they kill you. They come out all 30 mins...
Training Island: To go from one to an other difficulty you must kill the highest lvl boss on your difficulty to get the key to go to the next difficulty
This is not all! I am adding more Media including Unique Activities that we are adding.
Please be free to support us:
by puting this image into your signature: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CiMPt.png[/img]

item.title: Vertigo - Best Custom Maps Ever! - Comming soon
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:12, topic:412776”]Server name Officialy has now changed to “Eventcia”[/quote]Uhm yeah so thanks for asking me first…

Am I getting kicked out of my own project that I started? It’s called school…

Read full topic
